product_name: Coghlan's 5mm Mini Stretch Cords with Hooks - Package of 4
long_description: These 10" length cords are handy to bundle ski poles or fishing rods and ideal for dozens of other lightweight uses. Multi-strand rubber core features a weather-resistant outerwrap and coated, hardened-steel hooks. Each stretches to 20 inches. Comes in a package of four.
short_description: These 10" length cords are handy to bundle ski poles or fishing rods and ideal for dozens of other lightweight uses.
